analysis.description:
EscrowICO.totalSoldSlogns (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#159) shadows:
	- ICO.totalSoldSlogns (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#96-97)

SlognToken.buyFor (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#317-358) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(icoStep == 1 || icoStep == 2)
	- require(bool)(icoStep == 1 || icoStep == 2)
	- icoStep == 1 && (totalSoldSlogns + ethers) > 5000000000000000000000
	- icoStep == 1
	- icoStep == 2

ICO.calculateBonus.totalSoldSlogns (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#107-108) shadows:
	- ICO.totalSoldSlogns (state variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#96-97)

EscrowICO.icoFinishInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#188-214) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time <= ICO_TILL (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#191-193)

EscrowICO.refundInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#215-244) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time <= PRE_ICO_TILL (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#220-222)

SlognToken.buyFor (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#317-358) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- icoStep == 1 && (totalSoldSlogns + ethers) > 5000000000000000000000 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#326-332)
	- icoStep == 2 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#355-358)
	- require(bool)(icoStep == 1 || icoStep == 2) (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#323-325)
	- icoStep == 1 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#349-355)
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[this] >= slognAmount + bonus) (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#337-339)
	- bonus > 0 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#339-340)
ICO.totalSoldSlogns should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xc0506ceb264b057182a4c3ab8a0b910a545479f0.sol#96-97)
